description: In the prime factorization of n, increment even powers and decrement odd powers (multiplicative).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: f[n_, k_] := n^(If[EvenQ[k], k + 1, k - 1]); Table[Times @@ f @@@ FactorInteger[n], {n, 94}] (* _Jayanta Basu_, Aug 14 2013 *)
prog: (Haskell)a011264 n = product $ zipWith (^)                      (a027748_row n) (map a004442 $ a124010_row n)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 23 2013
author: _Marc LeBrun_
